references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational concept of Deep Equilibrium Models (DEQ), which is the core focus of the research presented in the provided document.
This paper applies DEQ models to the task of optical flow estimation, which is one of the primary experimental benchmarks used in the research.

references.paper_title: Implicit)²: Implicit layers for implicit representations
references.reason: This paper extends the concept of DEQs by introducing implicit layers, furthering the development of implicit neural network architectures relevant to the study.

references.paper_title: Implicit neural representations with periodic activation functions
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of implicit neural representations, a broader class of models to which DEQs belong, providing essential background and context to the research.

references.paper_title: RAFT: Recurrent all-pairs field transforms for optical flow
references.reason: This paper introduces the RAFT architecture, a state-of-the-art model for optical flow estimation that is used as a baseline and for comparison in the research.
